name: Ashes of Arcanum
description:
Ashes of Arcanum is a thrilling fantasy role-playing game that immerses players in a richly detailed world of magic, monsters, and mystery.
With a variety of character options and customizable abilities, players can embark on epic quests, battle fierce foes, and unravel the secrets of a world filled with danger and wonder.
Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to the world of TTRPG's. Ashes of Arcanum offers endless possibilities for adventure and excitement

Sep into a world of legend and lore with Ashes of Arcanum, the TTRPG that puts you at the center of an epic saga spanning centuries. Uncover secrets of a richly detailed world steeped in history and mythology, where anciet relics and forgotten magic hold the key to your ultimate destiny.
With deep character customization, you 'll be able to shape your character into anything you wish, and be a force to be reckoned with, mastering new skills, and abilities on your journey.
---
Now that. that is out of the way.
This project started as a on table TTRPG, and is now a VTTRPG.
I've worked tirelessly to attempt to make the system automatic with the help of an engine, but also be free form so there is enough play for homebrewing.
This will not be a fancy engine like Fantasy Grounds.
It simply started out as a character creator for me and my friends, and got away from me.

As typical with some games. This game DOESN'T come with voice/video connectivity. Just use discord or skype or telegram or something.
